name: Linked by Control
description:
Here my submission for the gmtk game jam.

Linked by Control is a puzzle game where you have to open doors for reach the exit of the level, the problem is that every scare are linked together by control, if you want to move up, every cube will move up, how do you will fusion theme together without killing them?

All sounds was made with my bass guitar and all sprites was made by myself.

The game was made in Godot

controls:

  • left: a or left
  • right: d or right
  • up: w or up
  • down: s or down
  • restart: r
  • menu: esc
